review: -Amazingly fun.-Runs perfectly on my GTX970/i5-4590 rig.-Story is meh, but it's Doom, so it really doesn't matter.-Gunplay is intuitive and smooth, really feels like the old 90's games.-Multiplayer is super fun, I don't know what the fuss was about.-Graphics are amazing, especially on ultra settings.-BUY IT!
